channel.title: Apple acquiring Gliimpse marks a new generation for the healthcare industry
channel.description:
The big news that was widely spread yesterday about Apple acquiring health-date startup Gliimpse (http://saasaddict.walkme.com/what-does-gliimpses-acquisition-mean-for-apple-and-the-healthcare-industry/) mark an important landmark in the future of digital healthcare, in my opinion.
After becoming digital, healthcare systems now move to the next step - making services and tools accessible for the non-tech-savvy population.
This news shows that the customer-centric approach is starting so spread, and this opens a door to more entrepreneurs who can make life even easier for us.

item.title: Apple acquiring Gliimpse marks a new generation for the healthcare industry
item.dc:creator: rfctr
item.description:
Meh.

Another Apple Watch to keep the shiny syndrome in full power? Or another Theranos, god forbid?

Read full topic
item.source: Apple acquiring Gliimpse marks a new generation for the healthcare industry
